briefTitle: Open Label Extension for Patients Coming From the Dosing Flexibility Study in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA)
officialTitle: A Phase IIIb, Multi-center Open-label, Follow-up Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Certolizumab Pegol Administered Concomitantly With Methotrexate in Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Participated in C87077.
summary: The purpose of this study is to continue to assess the safety of certolizumab pegol in combination with methotrexate (MTX).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects Reporting At Least One Treatment-emergent Adverse Event (TEAE) During The Study Period
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From Entry Visit up to approximately 60 weeks
